comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: nigeta on February 27, 2023, 04:19:03 AMHow to go from poor to millionaire fast in crypto？First off – there's no shortcut to wealth anywhere, cryptos inclusive. It can happen but that's by chance. The number of it happening is really infinitesimal. To be rich in cryptos, you don't have to be greedy to the point of bloating your expectations. By that I mean, you don't expect your $100 investment to afford you something like 1000% as ROI. It can also happen but don't let such be your expectations. You've to learn and know when to take profit. You can do that percentage sales of let's say 25% per each sale. Don't sell off everything whenever you're taking profit. Leave something on the table. The last, only gems can fetch you unimaginable ROI but you've to know how to identify these gems. This is where research becomes important.
